Package com.warzone.team08.VM.entities

Class PlayerTest

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.team08.VM.entities.PlayerTest
public class PlayerTest
extends java.lang.Object
Tests if the player can issue the order correctly.

    Loads different objects and performs necessary operations required to execute testcase.

    Tests the player issue order functionality.
    void testOutOfReinforcementIssueOrder()

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerTest

      public PlayerTest()

  • Method Details

    • beforeClass

      public static void beforeClass()
      Set the application environment.

    • beforeTestCase

      public void beforeTestCase() throws AbsentTagException, InvalidMapException, ResourceNotFoundException, InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Loads different objects and performs necessary operations required to execute testcase.
      Throws:
      AbsentTagException - Throws if any tag is missing in map file.
      InvalidMapException - Throws if map is invalid.
      ResourceNotFoundException - Throws if map file not found.
      InvalidInputException - Throws if input command is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - Throws if entity not found.
      See Also:
      If any exception thrown.

    • testIssueOrder

      public void testIssueOrder() throws VMException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Tests the player issue order functionality. An order is tested against the user input and it will be stored in the player's order list.
      Throws:
      VMException - Throws if any exception while processing the issue order request.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Throws if error occurs in execution.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - Throws if interruption occurs during normal execution.

    • testOutOfReinforcementIssueOrder

      public void testOutOfReinforcementIssueOrder() throws VMException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Tests the player issue order functionality when the player enters more reinforcements to deploy than possessing.
      Throws:
      VMException - If any exception while processing the issue order request.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Throws if error occurs in execution.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - Throws if interruption occurs during normal execution.
